summary: Boston is an American rock band formed in 1975, known for hits like "More Than a Feeling" and "Peace of Mind." Led by Tom Scholz and formerly featuring Brad Delp on vocals, they achieved great success in the '70s and '80s, selling over 75 million records worldwide. Despite limited releases since then, they continue to perform live. After Delp's death in 2007, Tommy DeCarlo became the new lead singer. The band has hinted at a seventh studio album.
title: Boston (band)
